name: Lapis Re:Lights
storyline: In the world of this game, witches beat beasts and serve the songs of hope. The pupils of Flora Girls' High School dream of saving people and making them smile. They are like 'idol' in our world. The player from another world is called 'foreigner' whose visiting was prophesied. The player becomes a teacher in Flora Girls' High School and in charge of a special class and leads students to turn them into great witches.
summary: Lapis Re:LiGHTs is a Japanese RPG social simulation game launched in 2021. In this game you are the teacher and educate witch high school girls.
